  • City: COLUMBIA

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Damage hazmat was reported to QA by vanline manager after being dropped and placed improperly by package handler. DescribePack: 1 of the 4 plastic bottles that contained hazardous liquid had a small hole near handle on the jug causing liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Damage hazmat was placed into hazmat bag and bucket
